channel.title: CVE Feed for YooMoney -- ЮKassa для WooCommerce (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-36379|2024-08-03T10:00:04.390Z -- yoomoney -- %D1%8Ekassa%20%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29

item.title: CVE-2022-34868|2024-08-03T09:22:10.628Z -- yoomoney -- %D1%8Ekassa%20%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
